item.title: I might be onto something!
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

It looks cleaner for me, so I will post it as it, php is similar to java which is similar to c which is about the same as action script.
[php]// Action script…

// [Action in Frame 2]
if (Number(2) == 2)
{
ifFrameLoaded(6)
{
gotoAndStop(6);
} // End of ifFrameLoaded
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if

// [Action in Frame 3]
gotoAndPlay(2);

// [Action in Frame 4]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 5]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 6]
function getTimeStamp()
{
var myDate = new Date();
var todayMonth = myDate.getMonth();
var todayDate = myDate.getDate();
var todayHours = myDate.getHours();
var todayMinutes = myDate.getMinutes();
return (todayMonth + “|” + todayDate + “|” + todayHours + “|” + todayMinutes);
} // End of the function
function loadVersion()
{
var loadVar = new LoadVars();
loadVar.onLoad = function (success)
{
if (success)
{
_level0.loadMovie(“chat” + loadVar.v + “.swf”);
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(5);
} // end else if
};
if (this._url.substr(0, 4) == “http”)
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt?” + getTimeStamp());
}
else
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt”);
} // end else if
} // End of the function
var playerVersion = getVersion();
playerVersion = playerVersion.split(" “);
playerVersion[1] = playerVersion[1].split(”,");
if (playerVersion[1][0] >= 6)
{
loadVersion();
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if
stop ();[/php][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2007, 09:24:11 PM[/size][hr]so what are you trying to do? and I noticed this is from sothlink swf decompiler

I understand it, just looks like it examines the date, and then makes a text variable about the date, checks the version, loads the versions from a text, then loads a swf name from the txt file

Read full topic

item.title: I might be onto something!
item.dc:creator: @maxexcloo maxexcloo
item.description:
@maxexcloo wrote:

Here are some links for clubpenguin…

http://play.clubpenguin.com/version.txt

http://play.clubpenguin.com/miniclip.swf
http://play.clubpenguin.com/mc.htm

http://play.clubpenguin.com/load.swf

Disney Home

Disney.com | The official home for all things Disney

The official website for all things Disney: theme parks, resorts, movies, tv programs, characters, games, videos, music, shopping, and more!

Also here is some action script…

[CODE]// Action script…

// [Action in Frame 2]
if (Number(2) == 2)
{
ifFrameLoaded(6)
{
gotoAndStop(6);
} // End of ifFrameLoaded
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if

// [Action in Frame 3]
gotoAndPlay(2);

// [Action in Frame 4]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 5]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 6]
function getTimeStamp()
{
var myDate = new Date();
var todayMonth = myDate.getMonth();
var todayDate = myDate.getDate();
var todayHours = myDate.getHours();
var todayMinutes = myDate.getMinutes();
return (todayMonth + “|” + todayDate + “|” + todayHours + “|” + todayMinutes);
} // End of the function
function loadVersion()
{
var loadVar = new LoadVars();
loadVar.onLoad = function (success)
{
if (success)
{
_level0.loadMovie(“chat” + loadVar.v + “.swf”);
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(5);
} // end else if
};
if (this._url.substr(0, 4) == “http”)
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt?” + getTimeStamp());
}
else
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt”);
} // end else if
} // End of the function
var playerVersion = getVersion();
playerVersion = playerVersion.split(" “);
playerVersion[1] = playerVersion[1].split(”,");
if (playerVersion[1][0] >= 6)
{
loadVersion();
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if
stop ();[/CODE]

If any one can understand this codfe please post here…
